name: lookaway
title: Lookaway
description: Control the Lookaway app for managing breaks.
author: kush

commands.name: startNextBreak
commands.title: Start Next Break
commands.description: Starts the next scheduled break immediately.

commands.name: pauseTimer
commands.title: Pause Work Mode
commands.description: Pauses the Lookaway work mode indefinitely.

commands.name: pauseTimerTemporarily
commands.title: Pause Work Mode Temporarily
commands.description: Pauses the Lookaway work mode for a specific duration.

commands.name: postponeBreak
commands.title: Postpone Break
commands.description: Postpones the upcoming break by a specific duration.

commands.name: resumeTimer
commands.title: Resume Work Mode
commands.description: Resumes the Lookaway work mode if paused.
